department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: "The objective of this course is aimed at cultivating abilities to data science practice on students. Many data analysis methods would be included into the class and lab, and also the data explanation skills."
goal.ch: 本課程的目標於學生實務資料分析能力的培養，課程中會教導各種資料分析的方法，解釋資料能力的訓練。

content.en:
W1: 課程介紹 (syllabus、term project說明)
Part I: Data Collection & Pre-processing
W2: Manual Data Collection: CGI/Automatic data collection: Clock syn.
W3: Holiday
W4: Data preprocessing/Data cleansing
W5: Data Augmentation (GAN)/Demos for Midterm proposal & cross evaluation
Part II: Feature Extraction & Transformation
W6: Feature data vs. Histogram/KL Divergence (KLD)
W7: Midterm: proposal reviews
W8: Holiday
W9: GMM, HHT & PCA
Part III: Modeling, Experiment design & Results
W10: t-Test, Wilcoxon Signed Rank test & Chi Square test
W11: Random sampling, Stratified random sampling (SRS) & cross validation
Part IV: Applications
W12: Smart Factory-CNN
W13: Smart Factory-EM
W14: Final Projects Presentation
W15: Final Projects Presentation
W16: Final Projects Presentation
Part V: Advanced Topics (彈性授課)
W17: Feature analysis: Variable importance
W18: Financial Distress Prediction

method.ch: 講授 實習/實驗 其他

grading.en: "Final Project 40% Lab Assignment 30% GN Reviews 15% Attendance 15%"
grading.ch: 學期報告 40%、課堂參與 30%、上台報告30%

flex_desc.ch: 進階線上教材、專題計畫

domain.en: 人工智慧、資料科學與多媒體研究群 、 軟體工程與計算理論研究群

en: Department:MSc in Computer Science and Information Engineering、Institute of Software Engineering、Master‘s Program in Artificial Intelligence, Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering、PhD in Computer Science and Information Engineering only.
Department:International Graduate Program in Artificial Intelligence only.
ch: 系所:限資訊工程學系碩士班、資訊工程學系軟體工程碩士班、資訊工程學系AI碩士班、資訊工程學系博士班。
